response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and productivity. Given its value to you, I understand its worth is estimated at $15,000. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,500. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit your business further. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 12500}
